[Retratos da atenção básica](https://retratos.navi.ifrn.edu.br) it's a web data app that allows 
researchers and general public to cross information about brazilian primary care system. 
It was developed using PostgresSQL, VueJS, Laravel for backend/frontend. Additional data analysis
were made using Python and Pandas.

![](retratos.png)

This was a challenging project because of the amount of data and the need to run complex queries 
against it. Advanced PostgresSQL features such as materialized views were used to improve aggregations.
